item.title: US-90/US-98 East at I-10 West - Mobile
item.description: US-90/US-98 East at I-10 West in Mobile. Use I-10 west for Pascagoula (Mississippi).

item.title: US-90/US-98 West - Mobile County
item.description: Enter Mobile County on US-90/US-98 West (Battleship Parkway).

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 30 Offramp at US-90/US-98
item.description: I-10 West - Exit 30 Offramp at US-90/US-98 - Battleship Parkway. Turn left for US-90/US-98 West to USS Alabama Memorial Park/Vietnam and Korean Veterans Memorial. Turn left for US-90/US-98 East/To US-31.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 38
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 38 - US-90/US-98/Daphne - Fairhope/Spanish Fort.

item.title: US-98 East at FL-173
item.description: US-98 East at FL-173 in Escambia County.

item.title: US-98 East Approaching FL-173
item.description: US-98 East approaching FL-173 in Escambia County.

item.title: US-98 East at FL-298 and CR-297
item.description: US-98 East at FL-298 and CR-297 in Escambia County. Turn right for FL-298 East to Myrtle Grove; left for CR-297 to Dog Track.

item.title: US-98 East - Welcome To Florida
item.description: Welcome To Florida on US-98 east.

item.title: AL-59 South at US-98 - Foley
item.description: AL-59 South at US-98 in Foley. Use US-98 East for the Foley Beach Express. US-98 is the Coastal Connection Scenic Byway.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 30
item.description: I-10 east approaching Exit 30 - US-90/US-98/Battleship Parkway/Spanish Fort.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 27
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 27 - US-90/US-98/Battleship Parkway/Battleship Park. Continue on I-10 east for Pensacola (FL).

item.title: Water St. North at I-165 and US-90
item.description: Water St. North at I-165 and US-90 (Beauregard St.). Turn left for US-90 West/To I-10/To US-98. Continue straight for I-165/US-90 East/To US-43/To US-98 Truck
